newsitem.title: UK: Lehman unit launches four offshore Irish funds.
newsitem.headline: Lehman unit launches four offshore Irish funds.

text.p: GLG Partners, a unit of Lehman Brothers, said in a statement it had launched four offshore Irish mutual funds.

GLG Investment Plc (Ucits) will offer three funds, The GLG Balanced Fund a "conservative asset allocation between cash, equity and bonds", the GLG Capital Appreciation Fund will specialise in equities and the GLG Performance Fund will comprise a concentrated portfolio of equity investments and charges a performance fee above three months dollar Libor.
GLG Investment Plc 2 will offer a global hedge fund called The GLG Opportunity Fund.
GLG also said it had appointed Richard J Bruce as senior portfolio manager. -- David Chance London newsroom 44 171 542 5887
